ToExpand.Title: about me
ToExpand.Text:
Hello! I'm Vittorio Romeo, a 20 year old compsci student at "Universit√† degli Studi di Messina". I develop games, applications and websites in my spare time, along with design and video editing work.


I am currently looking for a job or projects to work on. Check out my portfolio or contact me if you're interested.


Please consider donating if you enjoy my projects!
